backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing bookings in a map with create and month-filtered query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA-related features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including PWA manifest, theme meta tags, iOS web app tags, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and standalone display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker caching static assets and providing offline support with cache-first logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app registering the service worker and rendering core sections including PWA prompt.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered, padded container for the app.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Booking form with validation, month picker, submission to backend, and success/error UI states.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Brand header showing logo, title, subtitle, and hero banner image.
frontend/src/components/ContactLocationS: Displays phone, WhatsApp, and address details with a link to Google Maps.
frontend/src/components/HotelsDistanceSe: Shows distance info for Mecca and Madina hotels.
frontend/src/components/InstagramSection: Provides a button linking users to follow the project's Instagram profile.
Renders a scrollable month selector with highlight for the chosen month.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Shows a PWA install prompt with iOS instructions or install button based on device.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateBookingMutat: Provides a mutation for creating bookings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Detects installability and handles Android and iOS PWA install flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended color system via OKLCH vars, custom animations, fonts, shadows, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app requirements, features, icons, and architectural notes for a mobile booking app.
